questions.question: How do I select dream symbols?
questions.answer: Tap on emoji buttons to represent symbols. You can also add your own with a meaning!

questions.question: What is a Dream Personality Type?
questions.answer: We analyze your dream style and assign a fun persona like The Visionary or The Seeker.

questions.question: Why is the image sometimes missing?
questions.answer: The AI may take a few tries to generate your image. You can click 'Retry' if needed!

questions.question: Can others see my dream post?
questions.answer: Yes, if you post to Community! You can also choose visibility while posting.
